title: How to Access the Network Through Dial-Up
answer:
A: To solve the problem, do as follows:
             Step 1      Check whether the data card-related software is installed on the PC.
             Step 2      Insert the data card.
             Step 3      Start the Mobile Partner.
             Step 4      Check whether the correct profile is set. For details, see section 3.2 "How to set the profile?.
             Step 5      Wait till the signal and network identifier is identified on the Mobile Partner and click Connect.
